Info.title: Urban Traffic Flow Prediction Using LSTM and GRU

Keywords: traffic flow prediction; deep learning; LSTM (Long Short-Term Memory); GRU (Gated Recurrent Units)

General Computer Science.reason: Traffic flow prediction, deep learning, and recurrent neural networks are fundamental concepts within general computer science.
